content: Hello Hamoulton_! How can I help you in the world of Minecraft today?
That's great, Hamoulton_. If you need any assistance or have questions while testing, feel free to ask. I'm here to help.
I don't have that information, Hamoulton_. You can usually check your gamemode by typing '/gamemode' in the chat or checking your game settings.
You're holding sand in your main hand, Hamoulton_. Your off hand is empty.
You're facing a certain direction, but I don't have more specific information about what you're looking at, Hamoulton_. You're currently in the beach biome, though.

I don't have more information about what you're looking at, Hamoulton_. The direction you're facing is represented by net.minecraft.class_241@5f88b40c, but that doesn't give me a clear picture of your surroundings.
can you take me to the nearest village
I can guide you, Hamoulton_. However, I don't have the ability to teleport you directly. To get to the nearest village, you can try using the '/locate village' command in-game.
can you tell me things not minecraft related
I'd be happy to chat with you about non-Minecraft topics, Hamoulton_. What are you interested in talking about? Sports, movies, music, or something else?
